name: Tanks (itch) (Basiccomputer)
description:
TANKS A LOT For coming here.


In the game of Tanks two players control their own tanks to
to shoot each other and score points. The game will run for
3 minutes and whoever has the highest score wins. You can move
your tank in 8 directions and can shoot anywhere in the
battlefield. They're 5 battlefields you can choose from and
battle it out with your opponent.
AWSD = Move Red Tank
Space = Shoot red bullets
Arrow keys = Move Blue Tank
Enter = Shoot Blue Bullets
F1 = View Manual
F2 = Reset the game
F3 = Change Game Variation
F4 = Change Game Window
